titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4387) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1989 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, for the Intelligence Community Staff, for the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-647.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/24/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4387 (intelligence services funding).
